tool_description: Normalizes rating scores from different sources and scales to a unified rating system with statistical adjustments.

raw_ratings.description: Array of numerical rating values to normalize

handle_outliers.description: Whether to detect and adjust for rating outliers

error_messages: Invalid raw_ratings: Input must be a non-empty array of numerical values. Check that ratings were properly extracted from review data.
Mismatched array lengths: raw_ratings and source_scales arrays must have compatible lengths or source_scales must define mapping rules.
Invalid scale format: Use format 'min-max' (e.g., '1-5', '0-10'). Ensure minimum is less than maximum value.
Unsupported target_scale: Target scale must be in format 'min-max' with valid numerical range.
Rating out of source range: Some ratings fall outside their declared source scale ranges. Verify data integrity.
usage: Provide raw_ratings array and corresponding source_scales, specify target_scale format. The tool will normalize all ratings to the unified scale.

normalized_ratings.description: Array of ratings normalized to target scale

outliers_detected.description: Number of outlier ratings detected and adjusted
